dct_description_sm: relative a un m√©moire de M. Guittard.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "milles d'Allemagne" and "Lieues de France."
Shows topography, drainage, political boundaries, routes.
"Mem. de l'Ac R des Sc. 1762. page 336. Pl. 24" at top right margin.
